title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Prerequisites: AE21004, AE31002 3 - 0 - 0: 3 CreditsIntroduction, Transducers, Strain gauges and strain measurements, Calibration, Vibration testing machines, frequency response measurements, frequency analysis, types of signals, the frequency analyzers, Real time analysis, digital analysis, Signal conditioning, Vibration control, active and passive control.
